bio.p: C.A. Meseko , DVM PhD, he is a veterinarian cum virologist and completed his PhD in 2014 at the University of Ibadan, Ibadan after he was awarded doctoral fellowship by RSM-World Bank Programme in 2012 that was undertaken at IZSVe Padova Italy. In 2016 he received a postdoctoral fellowship of the Alexander von Humboldt Foundation (Germany) during which he spent two years at the Fredrich-Loefler-Institut, Insel Riems, Germany for research on avian and swine influenza virus. He returned back to the National Veterinary Research Institute, Vom Nigeria to continue his investigations on animal influenza, infectious and transboundary diseases.
